headline: N-able Appoints Patrick Pulvermueller to Board of Directors
summary: BURLINGTON, Mass., January 08, 2026--N-able (NYSE: NABL), a global software company delivering an end-to-end cyber resilience platform, today announced the appointment of Patrick Pulvermueller as a member of the board of directors. Pulvermueller joins N-able as the company continues to strengthen its leadership team and accelerate its mission to empower organizations to stay secure and resilient in business.

headline: 1 S&P 500 Stock with Promising Prospects and 2 We Avoid
summary: While the S&P 500 (^GSPC) includes industry leaders, not every stock in the index is a winner. Some companies are past their prime, weighed down by poor execution, weak financials, or structural headwinds.
